TABLE.NAME: workshopform_accumulative
TABLE.COMMENT: The assessment dimensions definitions of Accumulative grading strategy forms

FIELD.NAME: sort
FIELD.COMMENT: Defines the dimension order within the assessment form

FIELD.NAME: descriptionformat
FIELD.COMMENT: The format of the description field

FIELD.NAME: grade
FIELD.COMMENT: If greater than 0, then the value is maximum grade on a scale 0..grade. If lesser than 0, then its absolute value is the id of a record in scale table. If equals 0, then no grading is possible for this dimension, just commenting.
